name: Twisty Tunnels
description:
Created as a demo for the Indie Maker Syndicate Jam Jam Revolution.

You will need a twisty controller to play the game properly
(moving will feel very sluggish with just keyboard)
You can learn how to build this controller and participate in the jam here

Non-controller Controls

Make sure to click the game area before you begin playing

M to mute

Credits

Game by Andy Wallace 

Audio by Jay Ackley

NA16 Palette by Nauris

Fonts by Chevy Ray

Controller Photo by Matt Lepage
